item.title: About
item.description:
Nostr Compass is a technical resource for the Nostr protocol, providing developers, relay operators, and builders with the information they need to stay current on protocol evolution.

We publish weekly newsletters covering NIP proposals, client updates, relay developments, and notable code changes. Our podcast features conversations with the developers whose work is covered in each newsletter. The topic index documents key Nostr concepts with links to primary sources and our coverage.

If you’re building on Nostr and would like to contribute or appear on the podcast, contact us at info@nostrcompass.org.

item.title: Publications
item.description:
• Newsletters: Weekly coverage of NIP proposals, client updates, relay developments, and notable code changes across the Nostr ecosystem.

  • Blog posts: Occasional deep-dives and reference material from the Nostr Compass team.

  • Podcast Episodes: Conversations with the developers building Nostr.

item.title: Topics
item.description:
The Nostr Compass topic index documents key protocol concepts, NIPs, client implementations, and relay software. Each topic includes links to primary sources (NIPs, code repositories) and our newsletter coverage.

Topic index coming soon. We’re building out documentation of key Nostr concepts, NIPs, and implementations.

Want to suggest a topic? Open an issue on our GitHub repository.
